titleStmt.title: A letter written upon the discovery of the late plot
titleStmt.author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for H. Brome, and R. Chiswell,

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to G. Burnet.
This item is identified in the reel guide as Wing B5825. It is actually Wing (2nd ed.) B5825A.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
